Comprehensive security and recovery solu: 针对您所有数字媒体账户的全面安全和恢复解决方案。我们防止违规，恢复受损档案，并确保您的在线形象安全且不间断。
Real Estate Virality Engine: Make Projec: 房地产病毒式传播引擎：让项目从 0 到英雄
One place to access every visibility ser: 一个获取建立任何房地产项目炒作、信任和病毒式传播所需的每项可见性服务的场所。该平台使开发商能够在经过验证的新闻媒体、媒体渠道、房地产影响者、权力榜、奖项、狗仔队热点创作者以及播客/广播机会中获得位置。
AI-Enabled, GPT-Optimized Content Writin: 支持 AI、经过 GPT 优化的内容写作
Write content without requiring professi: 无需专业写作技能即可编写内容，同时遵守每个媒体平台的指南以加快发布速度。内容将针对 ChatGPT 等生成式 AI 引擎进行优化，并实现最高搜索可见性（全方位搜索优化）。
Passive Income Engine – Turn Connections: 被动收入引擎 – 将人脉转化为现金
Unlock an additional income opportunity:: 开启额外的收入机会：只需向您的网络推荐 VaaS Solutions 的可见性服务。分享潜在客户详情，每当您的推荐人在 VaaS Solutions 下单时，您都将获得终身推荐奖金。
Brand-Safe Creator Partnerships. Connect: 品牌安全创作者合作伙伴关系。将全球、区域、国家和地方创作者与合适的品牌联系起来
A structured marketplace connecting cele: 一个结构化的市场，将名人、宏观、微观和女性主导的创作者与对齐的品牌联系起来，利用数据驱动的发现，在平台和区域市场中实现真实、合规、注重绩效的合作。

A structured distribution framework enab: 一个结构化的分发框架，可通过社交媒体平台上的博主、YouTuber、Instagram 用户、TikTok 用户、视频博主和独立创作者实现区域优先的视频和编辑传播。该模型遵循类似于通过报纸和数字出版物进行传统新闻分发的原则，并针对具有区域相关性和平台遵守情况的影响者主导渠道进行了调整。

© 2026 Visibility as a Service (VaaS) So: © 2026 Visibility as a Service (VaaS) Solutions. 保留所有权利。
Find answers to frequently asked questio: 查找有关 News Marketplace 服务、保底发布、定价和媒体投放的常见问题解答。获取所有问题的答案。
Our guaranteed publication service ensur: 我们的保底发布服务确保您的内容将在约定的时间内发布在选定的媒体机构中。与传统的公关方法不同，我们提供 100% 的发布保证，价格透明且无隐藏费用。
In Which Media Outlets Can You Place Mat: 您可以在哪些媒体机构投放内容？
We have access to thousands of reputable: 我们可以访问成千上万份知名刊物，从顶级新闻媒体（福布斯、商业内幕、TechCrunch）到不同国家的垂直平台。我们的网络遍布北美、欧洲、亚洲和中东，涵盖主流和行业专用刊物。
What Is the Difference Between PR Throug: 通过编辑部进行的公关和保底发布有什么区别？
Traditional PR through editorial offices: 通过编辑部进行的传统公关涉及向记者推销故事，但不保证发布。我们的保底发布服务提供了确定性——您为在选定媒体机构中的确认位置付费，确保您的内容在没有传统公关方法的不确定性的情况下触达目标受众。
How Much Does It Cost and What Does the: 费用是多少，价格取决于什么？
Pricing depends on several factors inclu: 定价取决于几个因素，包括刊物的覆盖范围、权威性、主题相关性和内容长度。价格通常从每篇文章 500 美元到 5,000 美元以上不等，具体取决于媒体的声望和您的具体要求。我们提供没有隐藏成本的透明定价。
Publication timelines vary by outlet, ty: 发布时间表因媒体而异，通常从标准投放的 3-7 个工作日到优质刊物的 2-4 周不等。我们会在选择过程中为每个媒体提供具体的时间表，并在整个发布过程中为您提供最新信息。
Can I Choose Specific Media Outlets Myse: 我可以自己选择特定的媒体机构吗？
Yes, you control the choice of platforms: 是的，您可以自己控制平台的选择。平台显示可用媒体机构列表，包括价格和参数。您可以根据目标受众、行业、地理覆盖范围和预算要求选择特定的刊物。
We offer various publication formats inc: 我们提供各种发布格式，包括文章、采访、观点文章、案例研究、新闻稿和赞助内容。每种格式都针对特定刊物和您的内容目标进行了优化。
How Do You Guarantee That the Article Wi: 您如何保证文章会按照约定准确发布？
We have established relationships with p: 我们与刊物建立了稳固的关系，并使用成熟的流程来确保内容按约定发布。这包括内容审批工作流、与编辑团队的直接关系以及质量控制措施。任何偏差都会立即得到解决。
What Happens If the Publication Does not: 如果出版物没有发布会发生什么？
In the rare event that a publication doe: 在极少数未按保证进行发布的情况下，我们提供全额退款，或在同等或更好的媒体上重新发布，无需额外费用。我们的记录显示，在履行发布承诺方面拥有 99.9% 的成功率。
Is the Service Suitable for Startups and: 该服务适合初创公司和中小企业吗？
Absolutely! Our service is designed to b: 当然！我们的服务旨在让各种规模的企业都能使用。我们提供灵活的定价、支付计划，并可以为希望建立信誉和扩大覆盖范围的初创公司和中小企业量身定制内容。
Can Publications Be Targeted by Region o: 出版物可以针对地区或语言吗？
Yes, we offer geo-targeted and language-: 是的，我们提供地理定向和语言特定的发布选项。无论您需要特定国家、地区或语言的覆盖，我们都可以针对触达您所需受众群体的刊物进行投放。
Will the Materials Be Marked as \"Advert: 内容会被标为“广告”还是“赞助”？
Our standard publications appear as edit: 我们的标准发布显示为编辑内容，而不是广告。但是，一些刊物可能会根据其编辑政策包含免责声明。我们始终会提前明确披露要求，以免出现意外。
How Is the Effectiveness of Publications: 出版物的效果如何衡量？
We provide detailed analytics including: 我们提供详细的分析，包括发布链接、流量数据、社交媒体互动、反向链接概况和 SEO 影响。对于高级套餐，我们包含有关覆盖面、参与度和投资回报率指标的全面报告。
Can I Order a Series of Publications for: 我可以为公关活动订购一系列出版物吗？
Yes, we specialize in coordinated PR cam: 是的，我们专门从事协调公关活动，在不同媒体上进行多次发布。这种方法可以建立势头，并随着时间的推移最大限度地扩大内容的覆盖范围和影响。
I Don't Have Any Important News, How Can: 我没有任何重要新闻，我该如何推广自己？
We help create newsworthy content from y: 我们帮助根据您的专业知识、成就和行业见解创建具有新闻价值的内容。我们的内容策略师与您合作，开发引人入胜的叙事，将您或您的公司定位为您所在领域的思想领袖。
How Is Medialister Different from a PR A: Medialister 与公关公司有何不同？
Unlike traditional PR agencies that pitc: 与公关公司推销不确定结果的故事不同，Medialister 提供透明定价的保底发布。我们消除了不确定性并提供可衡量的结果，使内容营销变得可预测和可靠。

events.pageDesc: 发现并注册新闻和媒体行业的即将举行的活动。
privacy.heroDesc: 我们要像我们的新闻一样透明地重新设计我们的政策。没有法律术语。只有真相。
privacy.sections.collect.title: 我们收集什么
privacy.sections.collect.question: 我们对您有什么了解？
privacy.sections.collect.content: 我们相信极简主义。我们只收集传递新闻所绝对必要的资料：您的基本资料（姓名、电子邮件）和阅读偏好，以定制您的动态。没有隐藏的追踪器，没有窥探。
privacy.sections.usage.title: 我们如何使用它
privacy.sections.usage.question: 为什么我们需要它？
privacy.sections.usage.content: 您的数据为引擎提供动力。它有助于我们推荐您喜爱的“科技”文章，并跳过您不喜欢的“体育”文章。它还处理您的其高级订阅并确保您的帐户安全。
privacy.sections.security.title: 安全措施
privacy.sections.security.question: 我们安全吗？
privacy.sections.security.content: 我们将您的数据视为保险库。凭借军用级 AES-256 加密和持续的安全审计，您的信息被锁定，远离窥探。我们定期聘请白帽黑客对我们进行测试。
privacy.sections.control.title: 您的控制权
privacy.sections.control.question: 谁负责？
privacy.sections.control.content: 是您。永远是。您可以下载我们拥有的关于您的每一个字节的数据，更正它，或者只需单击一下即可将其从我们的服务器中完全删除。不问任何问题。没有“保留期”。
cookie.heroDesc: 我们认为您应该控制您的数字足迹。此仪表板准确解释了我们使用的 Cookie，并为您提供管理它们的知识。
cookie.essential.title: 必要的 Cookie
cookie.essential.desc: 网站运行所必需的（例如，登录状态、安全密钥）。您不能选择退出这些。
cookie.performance.title: 分析与性能
cookie.performance.desc: 帮助我们了解您如何使用该网站，以便我们使其变得更好。数据是匿名和汇总的。
cookie.marketing.title: 营销与广告
cookie.marketing.desc: 第三方用于在其他平台上向您提供相关广告。如果禁用，广告的相关性将会降低。
cookie.footerNote: * 这是一个视觉指南。要实际更改您的偏好，请检查您的浏览器设置或弹出式同意管理器。
cookie.manageDesc: 大多数 Web 浏览器允许您通过其设置首选项控制 Cookie。您可以随时关闭 Cookie，但请记住，这可能会禁用我们需要的一些功能。
cookie.durationDesc: 有些 Cookie 是“会话 Cookie”，当您关闭浏览器时会被删除。其他即“持久 Cookie”，直到它们过期或您删除它们为止。
cookie.thirdPartyDesc: 我们可能会使用受信任的第三方服务（如 Google Analytics），这些服务也可能在您访问期间在您的设备上设置 Cookie。
refund.heroDesc: 我们力求简单。如果出了问题，我们会解决。这是我们的参与规则。
refund.sections.eligibility.title: 资格
refund.sections.eligibility.question: 我什么时候可以获得退款？
refund.sections.eligibility.content: 我们相信公平竞争。如果我们完全未能提供约定的服务，如果有技术错误（如双重收费），或者如果您在我们的团队开始处理您的订单之前取消，您有权获得退款。
refund.sections.nonRefundable.title: 不可退款
refund.sections.nonRefundable.question: 什么是最终销售？
refund.sections.nonRefundable.content: 有些行为是不可逆的。一旦文章在线发布，营销活动已开始，或订单超过 30 天，我们无法提供退款，因为资源已经不可撤销地分配。
refund.sections.timeline.title: 时间表
refund.sections.timeline.question: 这需要多长时间？
refund.sections.timeline.content: 我们不会扣留您的钱。一旦您提交包含订单 ID 的请求，我们将有 48 小时内核实详细信息。如果获得批准，银行系统通常会在 7-10 个工作日内将退款反映在您的帐户中。
refund.sections.contact.title: 联系
refund.sections.contact.question: 还有问题吗？
refund.sections.contact.content: 每个案例都是独一无二的。如果您认为您的情况值得例外，或者如果您只是不确定，我们的支持团队会在这里倾听。我们以人性化的方式处理每个请求。
terms.heroDesc: 透明合作伙伴关系的明确准则。没有隐藏条款，只有直接的业务。
terms.serviceRestrictionsDesc: 在继续之前需要注意的重要限制。
terms.point1.title: 订单处理与取消政策
terms.point1.content: The following points may appear detailed, but they are designed to ensure smooth execution, timely delivery, and complete clarity — eliminating back-and-forth communication between the publication, our team, agency partners, and end clients. These guidelines help save time and effort for all parties involved.
terms.point2.title: 付款条款
terms.point2.content: Orders, once placed, cannot be cancelled or rejected. All payments must be made in advance. Pricing is quoted in USDT. If payment is made via bank transfer, an additional 7.5% will be added to the listed price.
terms.point3.title: 内容指南 - 超链接和图片
terms.point3.content: One hyperlink is allowed per article and may direct to a project website, company website, or social media profile. One image is allowed per article, which must be in landscape orientation. Portrait images will not be accepted. The image must not contain logos, thumbnails, web banners, homepage creatives, or any promotional branding.
terms.point4.title: 编辑自由裁量权 - 副标题和署名
terms.point4.content: Sub-headings or sub-titles are not guaranteed. If included and not approved by the editor, they may be removed without prior notice. Byline or author name is also not guaranteed. Publications may choose to publish under their editorial team name, consider the suggested name, or omit it entirely. Such decisions are at the sole discretion of the publication and may occur without notification. The inclusion of personal or company names in the article title is not guaranteed. Efforts will be made to accommodate the request, but confirmation will only be shared prior to publication.
terms.point5.title: 内容修订政策
terms.point5.content: Published articles cannot be revised in any manner. However, if there is any misalignment or deviation in wording from the originally submitted content, it must be reported within 24 hours from the time the live link is shared. Post that window, no changes will be accepted. If a published article needs to be taken down, this is treated as a separate service, chargeable on a case-by-case basis. A formal request must be submitted on the requesting party's official letterhead, along with a valid government-issued ID of the authorized person requesting the takedown.
terms.point6.title: 禁止的内容类别
terms.point6.content: Content related to geopolitics, gambling, adult material, CBD, drugs, alcohol, nudity, speculative topics, or any associated industries is strictly prohibited and will not be sent for review, approval, or publication. Content in the form of thought leadership, editorials, interviews, Q&A, opinion pieces, or personal branding is not accepted under standard terms. Some publications may consider such content at a different rate with separate terms and conditions, based on case-by-case evaluation.
terms.point7.title: 内容结构限制
terms.point7.content: Articles must not be structured around or contain titles that reflect the '6W1H' approach — what, where, when, why, who, whom, or how. Press releases involving partnerships, funding, MoUs, and similar announcements must be supported by formal documentation. Any article claiming guaranteed income, trading/project-based returns, or any self-declared millionaire, multi-millionaire, or billionaire status must also be backed by verifiable, formal evidence. Without this, content will not be submitted for editorial review.
terms.point8.title: 特定行业定价
terms.point8.content: Pricing for industries such as Web3 (crypto, blockchain, NFTs, etc.) and real estate (interior design, architecture, construction, proptech, real estate marketing, etc.) is different from standard sectors. Web3 content must be supported by formal evidence for all factual or financial claims to be considered for publishing.
terms.point9.title: 出版评级变化
terms.point9.content: With the exception of payment terms, most guidelines apply to Grade A+ and Grade A publications. Grade C publications are more flexible and carry fewer editorial restrictions. We are not responsible for content published on Grade C category publications, as they are merely websites not approved by any competent media authority, and they may directly approach your clients.
terms.point10.title: 服务范围 - 数字出版
terms.point10.content: The listed price includes digital publishing only. It does not include social media amplification or print exposure unless explicitly stated otherwise in writing.
terms.point11.title: 周转时间计算
terms.point11.content: All turnaround times are calculated based on official working days in GCC countries, aligned with their respective banking workweeks. Any content submitted after 2:00 PM (local time) will be considered as submitted on the next working day.
terms.point12.title: 社交媒体整合
terms.point12.content: Embedding social media posts (such as from Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, or YouTube) within article content is available at an additional cost, subject to approval by the publication. Similarly, posting the article on the respective publication's official social media platforms is possible at extra cost.
terms.point13.title: 列表内容限制
terms.point13.content: Articles written in listicle format or those containing terms such as 'Top,' 'Best,' 'Emerging,' or other ranking-based headlines or power lists are not permitted under standard publishing terms.
terms.point14.title: 特定出版指南
terms.point14.content: For publication-specific guidelines, please reach out via email (thesheikhmedia@gmail.com) or Telegram (VisibilityExperts) for the most accurate and updated information.
terms.point15.title: 条款审查与更新
terms.point15.content: This list is reviewed and updated on a monthly basis. However, in rare cases, some pricing or terms may not reflect the most current information due to delays or exceptional circumstances. In such cases, updated terms and pricing will be shared upon request or on a case-by-case or transactional basis.
terms.point16.title: 客户保密与直接参与
terms.point16.content: There is no direct engagement with end clients. No third-party agency is used for content publishing except for publications related to the West and Asia. This ensures complete trust, reliability, and service integrity. As a result of this model, previously published article links cannot be shared directly to protect the confidentiality of our partner agencies' client data. Reference links can, however, be provided for validation. The most credible testimony to our work comes from the partner agencies and the publications themselves. For those familiar with the industry or region, it is recommended to reach out to these entities for feedback and validation, rather than requesting direct testimonials from our side.
terms.point17.title: 在此市场中发现更低的价格
terms.point17.content: If a lower price is found in the market for the same content, same publication, and same section, a 5% additional discount will be offered, provided complete formal proof of the competing offer is submitted for verification.
terms.point18.title: 附加服务 - 社交媒体和数字媒体
terms.point18.content: In addition to media publications, we also offer a range of social media and digital media services with a guarantee—subject to representative availability and service status at the time of request. Please refer tab 'Additional Guaranteed Services'
terms.point19.title: 服务可用性
terms.point19.content: In addition to media publications, we also offer a range of social media and digital media services with a guarantee—subject to representative availability and the service being active at the time of request. Please refer to the tab titled 'Additional Guaranteed Services.' These services are unique and exclusive, and are not officially provided by the companies that own the respective social media platforms. They are carried out by experienced and skilled representatives using available forms, emails, or other methods, the specifics of which may not be fully disclosed to us.
terms.point20.title: 新闻发布服务
terms.point20.content: Apart from Gulf region (GCC) media services, we also offer press distribution services through our partner network. Please note that these may not be guaranteed to index on Google and might include our partner agency's name in the footer. Additionally, they may carry labels such as 'sponsored', 'supplied by', 'partner content', 'brand view', 'network', or 'disclaimer'. For specific details, please contact us via email (thesheikhmedia@gmail.com) or Telegram (VisibilityExperts).
terms.point21.title: 全球出版访问
terms.point21.content: Apart from Gulf region or GCC media services, we can source almost all major publications and newspapers from across the globe—including the USA, India, Europe, the UK, the Middle East, and more—through our partner network. For specific details, please contact us via email (thesheikhmedia@gmail.com) or Telegram (VisibilityExperts). Kindly note that we do not share lists unless we are an official partner of the respective media house.
terms.point22.title: 知识产权
terms.point22.content: All names, logos, websites, trademarks, registered marks, etc., are the official properties of their respective media houses and are mentioned here for reference purposes only.
terms.point23.title: 退款政策
terms.point23.content: In the event any service is not fulfilled, the advance payment will be fully processed within Seven (7) working days for all the services except social media related services where the payment will be processed within two (2) working days through the original payment method.
terms.point24.title: 出版评级系统
terms.point24.content: Grading is based on our real-time experience, tracking, trends, and the information available to our team. This grading is solely for internal reference and is not intended for publication, nor is it meant to harm, devalue, or misrepresent any organization. Our intention is to equip our agency partners with comprehensive information and access to the widest possible range of brands in one place—so they can avoid spending valuable time searching for publications across multiple sources.
terms.point25.title: 定价适用性
terms.point25.content: These rates are only applicable if the existing company is not working with any agency or directly with the publisher
terms.point26.title: 定价更新
terms.point26.content: These rates may change anytime without any prior intimation
terms.point27.title: 内容归档
terms.point27.content: Publications are guaranteed to be on website for twelve (12) months
terms.point28.title: 客户代表
terms.point28.content: We will use the name of the company as our client in our platforms
terms.restrictions.0: 不允许回溯日期的内容
terms.restrictions.4: 不在社交媒体或时事通讯上发布
terms.restrictions.6: 不放置在主页，放置在相关部分
trademark.heroDesc: 保护我们的品牌形象并尊重他人的知识产权。创意之路的规则。
trademark.sections.respect.title: 尊重知识产权
trademark.sections.respect.content: 我们尊重他人的知识产权，并希望我们的用户也这样做。本商标政策概述了我们在平台上使用我们的商标和他人商标的规则。
trademark.sections.ourTrademarks.title: 我们的商标
trademark.sections.ourTrademarks.content: News Marketplace 名称、徽标以及我们服务中包含的任何其他产品或服务名称或标语均为 News Marketplace 及其供应商或许可方的商标，未经 News Marketplace 或适用商标持有人的事先书面许可，不得全部或部分复制、模仿或使用。
trademark.sections.thirdParty.title: 第三方商标
trademark.sections.thirdParty.content: 我们服务中提到的所有其他商标、注册商标、产品名称和公司名称或徽标均为其各自所有者的财产。提及任何产品、服务、流程或其他信息，无论是通过商品名、商标、制造商、供应商还是其他方式，并不构成或暗示我们要对其进行认可、赞助或推荐。
trademark.sections.infringement.title: 侵权索赔
trademark.sections.infringement.content: 如果您认为您的商标正在以构成商标侵权的方式在我们的平台上使用，请联系我们并提供您索赔的具体细节，包括商标注册号和侵权内容的位置。
trademark.sections.assets.title: 品牌资产使用
trademark.sections.assets.content: 您只能在获得我们许可并遵守我们品牌准则的情况下使用我们的官方品牌资产。不得修改、更改或扭曲我们的徽标，也不得以令人困惑或误导的方式使用它们。
dataProtection.heroDesc: 安全不是一种功能；它是我们的基础。我们对待您的个人数据就像对待金融资产一样严谨。
dataProtection.sections.stewardship.cont: News Marketplace 充当您信息的主要保管人（数据控制者）。我们不仅存储数据；我们管理其道德使用，严格确定它“为什么”以及“如何”服务于您的体验。
dataProtection.sections.legal.title: 法律框架
dataProtection.sections.legal.subtitle: 处理依据
dataProtection.sections.legal.content: 我们从不在真空中处理数据。每一个处理的字节都建立在坚实的法律支柱之上：您的明确同意、合同必要性、法定义务或经过验证的合法利益，这些利益绝不会凌驾于您的基本权利之上。
dataProtection.sections.rights.title: 您的数据权利法案
dataProtection.sections.rights.subtitle: 赋权
dataProtection.sections.rights.content: 您不是被动的当事人。您拥有访问文件、纠正错误、清除历史记录（“被遗忘权”）、限制主动处理以及将数据移植到其他服务的权力。这些不仅仅是功能；它们是您的合法权利。
dataProtection.sections.retention.title: 保留生命周期
dataProtection.sections.retention.conten: 数据有过期日期。我们遵守严格的保留时间表，仅在满足用户特定请求或法律授权所需的确切持续时间内保留个人信息，之后将其安全清除。
dataProtection.sections.transfers.title: 全球传输
dataProtection.sections.transfers.conten: 在互联的世界中，数据在流动。当我们跨境传输您的信息时，我们会将其包裹在一层法律保护——标准合同条款 (SCC)——中，以确保您的隐私权保持完整，无论身在何处。
reselling.heroDesc: 代理商和合作伙伴的综合指南。透明和有利可图的合作伙伴关系的明确条款。
reselling.points.overview.title: 协议概述
reselling.points.overview.content: 本转售协议管辖合作伙伴、代理商和授权经销商向其客户转售我们的出版和媒体服务的条款。它构成了我们商业关系的基础框架。
reselling.points.authorized.title: 授权经销商身份
reselling.points.authorized.content: 要成为授权经销商，您必须申请并获得我们要建立合作伙伴关系的团队的批准。经销商是独立的承包商，在法律意义上不是 News Marketplace 的员工、代理或合作伙伴。
reselling.points.pricing.title: 定价和利润
reselling.points.pricing.content: 经销商根据其合作伙伴级别获得批发定价或折扣结构。经销商可以自由地为其客户设定自己的零售价格，前提是他们不歪曲服务价值或功能。
reselling.points.whiteLabel.title: 白标
reselling.points.whiteLabel.content: 除非另有说明，否则服务以白标形式提供。经销商可以在其自己的品牌下展示报告和出版证明。但是，他们不得声称拥有属于出版商的基础媒体渠道或商标。
reselling.points.confidentiality.title: 客户保密
reselling.points.confidentiality.content: 我们尊重经销商与客户的关系。我们不会直接招揽您的客户。有关订单的所有沟通都将通过经销商进行，以确保您客户关系的完全隐私和信任。
reselling.points.obligations.title: 经销商义务
reselling.points.obligations.content: 经销商负责确保其客户遵守我们的内容准则和条款与条件。经销商不得故意提交违禁内容。经销商负责处理其客户的所有一线支持和账单。
reselling.points.termination.title: 终止
reselling.points.termination.content: 如果经销商违反这些条款、从事欺诈活动或以损害我们的声誉或与出版商关系的方式开展业务，我们保留终止经销商协议的权利。
